EmailTemplate.description: Exam type is renew-did not find the exact match
EmailTemplate.name: Renew Exam type with review needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Registered Service Agent (RSA) Exam – Renewed License In Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Service Agent examination data for {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.MiddleName} {!Contact.LastName} has been submitted to the RSA Administrator. You will be notified via email when the review is complete. The email will contain information on how to login and view or print your agent license. Please allow 5 business days for processing.
For RSA Program information, please visit CDFA - DMS - Registered Service Agency (ca.gov).
RSA Administrator Division of Measurement Standards California Department of Food and Agriculture
Questions? Please contact us at rsa@cdfa.ca.gov
